Professional Drain Tile Installation in Toronto

Modern foundation drainage systems for lasting protection

Drain tile systems are your foundation's first line of defense against water damage. Our expert contractors install modern perforated pipe systems that effectively collect and redirect groundwater away from your home. Using advanced materials and proven installation techniques, we provide reliable foundation drainage with lifetime warranties.

Modern Drain Tile Technology

Today's drain tile systems use advanced corrugated plastic pipes and filter fabrics that last 50+ years. Much more effective than old clay tiles or concrete weeping tiles.

Free Assessment: (437) 545-0067

Why Modern Drain Tile Systems Are Superior

Advanced materials and professional installation

Advanced Materials

Corrugated HDPE pipe with superior flow capacity and longevity

Filter Fabric Protection

Geotextile fabric prevents soil infiltration and clogging

Precision Installation

Laser-guided slopes ensure optimal water flow to collection points

Quality Fittings

Professional connections and fittings prevent leaks and failures

Flow Testing

Every system tested to ensure proper operation before completion

Lifetime Support

Ongoing maintenance guidance and warranty protection

Upgrade from Old Weeping Tile

If your home has original clay or concrete weeping tiles from the 1950s-1980s, upgrading to modern drain tile can dramatically improve your foundation's protection.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I know if I need drain tile installation?

Signs include: basement water infiltration, musty odors, efflorescence on walls, foundation cracks, or an aging/failed existing drainage system. A professional assessment can determine if drain tile is the right solution.

Can drain tile be added to existing homes?

Absolutely! Interior drain tile can be installed in most existing basements. We excavate a trench around the perimeter, install the system, and restore the floor. Minimal disruption to your daily life.

What maintenance do drain tile systems require?

Modern drain tile systems require minimal maintenance. Annual sump pump testing, keeping gutters clean, and periodic inspection of discharge points. We provide maintenance guides and annual service options.

How is drain tile different from a sump pump?

Drain tile collects water from around your foundation, while sump pumps remove collected water. They work together - drain tile gathers the water, sump pumps discharge it. Both are typically needed for complete protection.
